import{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{AnimationUtils}from'../utils/animations';// Custom hook for button animations
export const useButtonAnimation=function(){let type=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'default';const ref=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const element=ref.current;if(!element)return;let cleanup;switch(type){case'primary':cleanup=AnimationUtils.initPrimaryButton(element);AnimationUtils.addRippleEffect(element);break;case'tab':cleanup=AnimationUtils.initTab(element);break;default:cleanup=AnimationUtils.initButton(element);break;}return cleanup;},[type]);return ref;};// Custom hook for card animations
export const useCardAnimation=()=>{const ref=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const element=ref.current;if(!element)return;const cleanup=AnimationUtils.initCard(element);AnimationUtils.fadeInUp(element,0.1);return cleanup;},[]);return ref;};// Custom hook for entrance animations
export const useEntranceAnimation=function(){let type=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'fadeInUp';let delay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;const ref=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const element=ref.current;if(!element)return;switch(type){case'fadeInUp':AnimationUtils.fadeInUp(element,delay);break;case'slideInLeft':AnimationUtils.slideInLeft(element,delay);break;case'bounceIn':AnimationUtils.bounceIn(element,delay);break;default:AnimationUtils.fadeInUp(element,delay);}},[type,delay]);return ref;};export default{useButtonAnimation,useCardAnimation,useEntranceAnimation};
